article_text:
Valentine’s Day isn’t just about love, roses and chocolates anymore. Now it’s a chance to propagandize your nearest and dearest in favor of the disastrous Affordable Care Act.

Obama has already tried to get you to co-opt Thanksgiving for political reeducation of family members and ruin Christmas by subjecting your loved ones to fireside Obamacare pep rallies. But now the administration is aiming straight for the heart:

The National Women’s Law Center, an outside group collaborating with the administration’s #ACAValentines campaign on Twitter, created the above ad, but there’s a lot more where that came from, from groups such as Moms Rising and Young Invincibles:

Via the Huffington Post.

article_metadata.tweettext: Don't Worry if You're Single, Obamacare Can Be Your Valentine!
article_metadata.sailthru.author: Alec Torres

Valentine’s Day isn’t just about love, roses and chocolates anymore.
But now the administration is aiming straight for the heart:The National Women’s Law Center, an outside group collaborating with the administration’s #ACAValentines campaign on Twitter, created the above ad, but there’s a lot more where that came from, from groups such as Moms Rising and Young Invincibles:Via the Huffington Post.
